description: Details of programme of archaelogical investigation and implementation pursuant to condition 9 of planning permission ref: PP/2011/5230 dated: 22/03/2012 for: Construction of a three storey building comprising replacement swimming pool and learner pool with associated changing facilities, studio spaces, fitness suite, community facilities and reception hall located behind the retained Kings Rooms facade fronting High Street and attached to the Town Hall Extension; retention of Acton Baths Chimney; change of use of Town Hall Extension to a service centre on the ground floor and library on the first floor; associated cycle storage and waste and recycling facilities (following demolition of the Acton Baths building and the substantial demolition (except the front fatade) of the Kings Rooms) (Deemed Consent)
